roman: Tabaarakal-lazee biyadihil mulku wa huwa 'alaa kulli shay-in qadeer
Allazee khalaqal mawta wal hayaata liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu 'amalaa wa huwa al'azeezul ghafoor
Allazee khalaqa sab'a samaawaatin tibaqan maa taraa fee khalqir Rahmaani min tafawut farji'il basara hal taraa min futoor
Thummarji'il basara karratayni yanqalib ilaykal basaru khaasi-anw wa huwa haseer
Wa laqad zayyannas samaaa-ad dunyaa bimasabeeha wa ja'alnaahaa rujoomal-lish shayaateen wa a'tadnaa lahum 'azaabas sa'eer
Wa lillazeena kafaroo birabbihim 'azaabu jahannama wa bi'sal maseer
Izaaa ulqoo feehaa sami'oo lahaa shaheeqanw wa hiya tafoor
Takaadu tamayyazu minal ghaiz kullamaa ulqiya feehaa fawjun sa-alahum khazanatuhaa alam ya'tikum nazeer
Qaaloo balaa qad jaa'anaa nazeerun fakazzabnaa wa qulnaa maa nazzalallahu min shay-in in antum illaa fee dhalaalin kabeer
Wa qaaloo law kunnaa nasma'u aw na'qilu maa kunnaa fee as-haabis sa'eer
Fa'tarafuu bizambihim fasuhqan li as-haabis sa'eer
Innal lazeena yakhsyauna rabbahum bilghaibi lahum maghfiratun wa ajrun kabeer
Wa asirroo qawlakum awijharoo bih innahu 'aleemun bizaatis sudoor
Alaa ya'lamu man khalaqa wa huwal lateeful khabeer
Huwal lazee ja'ala lakumul arda zaloolan famshoo fee manaakibihaa wa kuluu mir rizqihi wa ilaihin nushoor
A-amintum man fissamaaa'i ai yakhsifa bikumul arda fa-itha hiya tamoor
Am amintum man fissamaaa'i ai yursila 'alaykum haasiba fasata'lamoona kayfa nadeer
Wa laqad kazzabal lazeena min qablihim fakayfa kaana nakeer
Awa lam yaraw ilat-tayri fawqahum saaffaatiw wa yaqbidhna maa yumsikuhunna illar Rahmaan innahu bikulli shay-in baseer
Am man haza allazee huwa jundul lakum yansurukum min doonir Rahmaan inil kaafiroona illaa fee ghuroor
Am man haza allazee yarzuqukum in amsaka rizqah bal lajju fee utuwwin wa nufoor
Afaman yamshi mukibban 'alaa wajhihi ahdaa amman yamshi sawiyyan 'alaa siraatim mustaqeem
Qul huwa allazee ansha-akum waja'ala lakumussam'a wal absaara wal af'idah qaleelan maa tashkuroon
Qul huwa allazee zara-akum fil ardi wa ilayhi tuhsharoon
Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal wa'du in kuntum saadiqeen
Qul innamal 'ilmu 'indallah wa innamaaa ana nazeerun mubeen
Falammaa ra-awhu zulfatan see-at wujoohul lazeena kafaroo wa qeela haaza allazee kuntum bih tadda'oon
Qul ara'aytum in ahlakaniyallahu waman ma'iya aw rahimanaa faman yujeerul kaafireena min 'azaabin aleem
Qul huwa ar-Rahmaan aamannaa bih wa 'alayhi tawakkalnaa fasata'lamoona man huwa fee dhalaalin mubeen
Qul ara'aytum in asbaha maa'ukum ghawran faman ya'teekum bimaa'in ma'een
